name: Truck World: Euro & American
description:
You get to play the driver in a transportation company. Explore locations, take on interesting missions, convey cargo, build up experience, discover European and American trucks and upgrade your vehicle.

Game features:
European and American trucks!
Detailed salons for all types of trucks!
Detailed environment, the highest quality graphics!

You’ll love the new track simulator featuring exciting cargo delivery missions on tracks. Experience the world as a driver sees it from the cab. Take on the mission and hit the road!
